Row.Text: In case of a nuclear attack, population loss is reduced by 75%, and garrisoned Units in the City take 25 HP damage instead of getting destroyed.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]In case of a nuclear attack, population loss is reduced by 75%, and garrisoned Units in the City take 25 HP damage instead of getting destroyed.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]In case of a nuclear attack, population loss is reduced by 75%, and garrisoned Units in the City take 25 HP damage instead of getting destroyed.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]In case of a nuclear attack, population loss is reduced by 75%, and garrisoned Units in the City take 25 HP damage instead of getting destroyed.

Bomb Shelters reduce population loss from a nuclear attack on this city by 75%. They also protect all Units inside the City from getting destroyed, making them take 25 HP damage instead. Duck and Cover!

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Bomb Shelters reduce population loss from a nuclear attack on this city by 75%. They also protect all Units inside the City from getting destroyed, making them take 25 HP damage instead. Duck and Cover!
